content: 16 if you will use safety joints insert the joint now between round 29 and 30 make sure the toes are pointing forward the joint will be on the side take the help of the crochet hook to make a bigger hole since they are quite wide and tricky to insert don t forget to place them on opposite of each other on right and left leg read more about security joints on page 18 round 32 2 single_crochet decrease x 4 12 round 33 1 single_crochet decrease x 4 8 round 34 decrease x 4 4 fasten_off if you will have moveable legs with either security joints or just yarn read more on page 18 then leave a small yarn tail weave the yarn tail through the front loops of each stitch and pull it tight to close then weave in the yarn end if you will sew the leg to the body not moveable then leave a long yarn tail weave the yarn tail through the front loops of each stitch and pull it tight to close don t cut the yarn you will use this to sew the leg to the body 9 arms make 2 start with dark brown color round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase x 6 18 round 4-6 18 single_crochet 3 rounds 18 change to brown color round 7 18 single_crochet 18 change to yellow color round 8 4 single_crochet decrease x 3 15 now make the toes same procedure as the legs for the arm you will insert the needle between round 1 and 2 and in again between round 5 and 6 i recommend to have the start/end of the round in the back round 9-10 15 single_crochet 2 rounds 15 round 11 3 single_crochet decrease x 3 12 stuff the arm with filling the beginning can be filled firmly but then fill rest of the arm lightly keep filling as you go but stop filling at round 17 the top of the arm should be without filling round 12-24 12 single_crochet 13 rounds 12 if you will use safety joints insert the joint now between round 21 and 22 make sure the toes are pointing forward the joint will be on the side take the help of the crochet hook to make a bigger hole since they are quite wide and tricky to insert don t forget to place them on opposite of each other on left and right arm read more about security joints on page 18 round 25 decrease x 6 6 fasten_off if you will have moveable arms with either security joints or just yarn read more on page 18 then leave a small yarn tail weave the yarn tail through the front loops of each stitch and pull
